info.title: FootprintProfiles
info.description: Microsoft Footprint active monitoring system REST API version 2020-02-01-preview.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available API operations
get.summary: Retrieves a list of available API operations under this Resource Provider.

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the list of operations under Microsoft.FootprintMonitoring resource provider.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get all Footprint profiles under a subscription.
get.description: Retrieves the information about all Footprint profiles under a subscription.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the Footprint profiles found.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get all Footprint profiles under a resource group.
get.description: Retrieves the information about all Footprint profiles under a resource group.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the Footprint profiles found.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.description: Retrieves the information about a single Footprint profile.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the single Footprint profile's information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

put.summary: Creates or updates a Footprint profile resource.
put.description: Creates or updates a Footprint profile with the specified properties.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Footprint profile creation or update parameters.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated and the response contains the updated Footprint profile's information.

201.description: The request was successful. The resource was created and the response contains the created Footprint profile's information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was deleted.

204.description: The request was successful, but the resource didn't exist anymore.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

patch.description: Updates an existing Footprint profile resource.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get all measurement endpoints under a Footprint profile.
get.description: Retrieves the information about all measurement endpoints under a Footprint profile.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the Footprint measurement endpoints found.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get a measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile resource.
get.description: Retrieves the information about a single measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the single Footprint profile's measurement endpoint information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

put.summary: Creates or updates a single measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile resource.
put.description: Creates or updates a single measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile with the specified properties.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Footprint measurement endpoint creation or update parameters.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated and the response contains the updated Footprint measurement endpoint's information.

201.description: The request was successful. The resource was created and the response contains the created Footprint measurement endpoint's information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

delete.summary: Deletes a measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile resource.
delete.description: Deletes an existing measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was deleted.

204.description: The request was successful, but the resource didn't exist anymore.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

patch.summary: Updates a measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile resource.
patch.description: Updates an existing measurement endpoint under a Footprint profile resource.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get all measurement endpoint conditions under a Footprint measurement endpoint.
get.description: Retrieves the information about all measurement endpoint conditions under a Footprint measurement endpoint.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the Footprint measurement endpoint conditions found.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get a measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement endpoint resource.
get.description: Retrieves the information about a single measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement endpoint.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the single measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement's information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

put.summary: Creates or updates a measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement resource.
put.description: Creates or updates a measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement with the specified properties.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Footprint measurement condition creation or update parameters.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated and the response contains the updated measurement endpoint condition information under a Footprint measurement.

201.description: The request was successful. The resource was created and the response contains the created measurement endpoint condition information under a Footprint measurement.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

delete.summary: Deletes a measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement resource.
delete.description: Deletes an existing measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was deleted.

204.description: The request was successful, but the resource didn't exist anymore.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

patch.summary: Updates a measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement resource.
patch.description: Updates an existing measurement endpoint condition under a Footprint measurement resource.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.summary: Get all experiments under a Footprint profile.
get.description: Retrieves the information about all experiments under a Footprint profile.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the Footprint experiments found.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

get.description: Retrieves the information about a single Footprint experiment.

200.description: The request was successful. The response contains the single Footprint experiment's information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

put.summary: Creates or updates a Footprint experiment resource.
put.description: Creates or updates a Footprint experiment with the specified properties.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Footprint experiment creation or update parameters.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated and the response contains the updated Footprint experiment's information.

201.description: The request was successful. The resource was created and the response contains the created Footprint experiment's information.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was deleted.

204.description: The request was successful, but the resource didn't exist anymore.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

patch.description: Updates an existing Footprint experiment resource.

200.description: The request was successful. The resource was updated.

default.description: A response with a status and optional error describing the reason for the operation result.

DefaultErrorResponse.title: Default Error Response
DefaultErrorResponse.description: The base response with an error.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

ResourceProviderOperationList.title: Resource Provider's Available Operations
ResourceProviderOperationList.description: A list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next page for list of Azure operations.

ResourceProviderOperationDisplay.title: Resource Provider Operation Properties
ResourceProviderOperationDisplay.description: Describes the properties of the Operation.

operation.description: Name of the resource provider operation.

description.description: Description of the resource provider operation.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

location.description: Region where the Azure resource is located.

FootprintProfileList.description: Result of the request to list Footprint profiles. It contains a list of Footprint profile objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Footprint profile objects if there are any.

FootprintProfileProperties.title: Footprint Profile Properties
FootprintProfileProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint profile resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

profileId.title: Profile Id
profileId.description: The id of the Footprint profile.

description.title: Profile Description
description.description: The description of the Footprint profile.

version.title: Profile Version
version.description: The version of the Footprint profile.

startDelayMilliseconds.title: Start Delay (ms)
startDelayMilliseconds.description: The delay in milliseconds that the clients should wait for until they start performing measurements.

measurementCount.title: Count of Measurements
measurementCount.description: The number of measurements to perform.

coldPathSamplingPercentageRate.title: Cold Path Sampling Percentage
coldPathSamplingPercentageRate.description: The default sampling percentage for cold path measurement storage.

measurementEndpoints.title: Measurement Endpoints
measurementEndpoints.description: The endpoints which to perform measurements to.

reportingEndpoints.title: Reporting Endpoints
reportingEndpoints.description: The endpoints which to upload measurements to.

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.description: The experiments currently associated to this Footprint profile.

MeasurementEndpointList.description: Result of the request to list Footprint measurement endpoints. It contains a list of Footprint measurement endpoints objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: A collection of Footprint measurement endpoints.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Footprint measurement endpoints objects if there are any.

MeasurementEndpoint.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint
MeasurementEndpoint.description: A model representing a Footprint measurement endpoint.

MeasurementEndpointProperties.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Properties
MeasurementEndpointProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint Measurement Endpoint resource.

endpointId.title: Measurement Endpoint Id
endpointId.description: The id of a measurement endpoint.

description.title: Measurement Endpoint Description
description.description: The description of a measurement endpoint.

endpoint.title: Measurement Endpoint
endpoint.description: The value of a measurement endpoint.

measurementType.title: Measurement Endpoint Type
measurementType.description: The type of a measurement endpoint.

weight.title: Measurement Endpoint Weight
weight.description: The weight of a measurement endpoint.

experimentId.title: Measurement Endpoint Experiment Id
experimentId.description: The id of an experiment that a measurement endpoint is part of.

objectPath.title: Measurement Endpoint Object Path
objectPath.description: The path of the object that a measurement endpoint points to.

conditions.title: Measurement Endpoint Conditions
conditions.description: The conditions of a measurement endpoint.

startTimeUTC.title: Measurement Endpoint Start Time
startTimeUTC.description: The start time that a measurement endpoint should be served.

endTimeUTC.title: Measurement Endpoint End Time
endTimeUTC.description: The end time that a measurement endpoint should be served.

hotPathSamplingPercentageRate.title: Measurement Endpoint Hot Path Sampling Rate
hotPathSamplingPercentageRate.description: The percentual sampling rate for the hot path logging of a measurement endpoint.

warmPathSamplingPercentageRate.title: Measurement Endpoint Warm Path Sampling Rate
warmPathSamplingPercentageRate.description: The percentual sampling rate for the warm path logging of a measurement endpoint.

coldPathSamplingPercentageRateOverride.title: Measurement Endpoint Cold Path Sampling Rate
coldPathSamplingPercentageRateOverride.description: The percentual sampling rate for the cold path logging of a measurement endpoint.

metadata.title: Measurement Endpoint Metadata
metadata.description: The metadata of a measurement endpoint.

FootprintExperimentList.description: Result of the request to list Footprint experiments. It contains a list of Footprint experiments objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Footprint experiment objects if there are any.

FootprintExperiment.title: Footprint Experiment
FootprintExperiment.description: A model representing the Footprint experiment.

FootprintExperimentProperties.title: Footprint Experiment Properties
FootprintExperimentProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint Experiment resource.

experimentId.title: Footprint Experiment Id
experimentId.description: The id of a Footprint experiment.

description.title: Footprint Experiment Description
description.description: The description of a Footprint experiment.

status.title: Footprint Experiment Status
status.description: The status of a Footprint experiment.

MeasurementEndpointConditionList.description: Result of the request to list Footprint measurement endpoint contidions. It contains a list of Footprint measurement endpoint contidions objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: A collection of Footprint measurement endpoint contidions.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Footprint measurement endpoint contidion objects if there are any.

MeasurementEndpointCondition.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition
MeasurementEndpointCondition.description: A model representing the Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

properties.title: Footprint measurement endpoint condition additional properties
properties.description: Additional Footprint measurement endpoint condition properties.

MeasurementEndpointConditionProperties.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Properties
MeasurementEndpointConditionProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition resource.

conditionId.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Id
conditionId.description: The id of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

type.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Type
type.description: The type of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

variable.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Variable
variable.description: The variable of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

operator.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Operator
operator.description: The operator of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

constant.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Constant
constant.description: The constant of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

FootprintProfilePatch.title: Footprint Profile Update Model
FootprintProfilePatch.description: The model for patches on Footprint profile resources.

FootprintExperimentPatch.title: Footprint Experiment Update Model
FootprintExperimentPatch.description: The model for patches on Footprint experiment resources.

MeasurementEndpointPatch.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Update Model
MeasurementEndpointPatch.description: The model for patches on Footprint measurement endpoint resources.

MeasurementEndpointConditionPatch.title: Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition Update Model
MeasurementEndpointConditionPatch.description: The model for patches on Footprint measurement endpoint condition resources.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

FootprintProfileNameParameter.name: footprintProfileName
FootprintProfileNameParameter.description: Name of the Footprint profile resource.

MeasurementEndpointNameParameter.name: measurementEndpointName
MeasurementEndpointNameParameter.description: Name of the Footprint measurement endpoint resource.

MeasurementEndpointConditionNameParamete.name: conditionName
MeasurementEndpointConditionNameParamete.description: Name of the Footprint measurement endpoint condition resource.

ExperimentNameParameter.name: experimentName
ExperimentNameParameter.description: Name of the Footprint experiment resource.
